text: Va nest kase zolimtar az onon, ki jod kardani nomi Allohro dar mascidho az ʙarpo dostani namoz va tilovati Qur'on va monandi on man' mekunand va dar vajronii onho mekusand. In guruh zolimonro sazovor ast, ki harosonu tarson ʙa mascidho darojand. Onhoro dar dunjo xori va dar oxirat azoʙi ʙuzurgest
